title: Who is the most luckiest member of Blackpink? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my own opinion, I think it’s Lisa. To my knowledge, she hasn’t been in any scandals or hasn’t been in any controversial events. She is adored by millions and isn’t overshadowed by her other members.
Actually, all of them! Just imagine having millions of people loving you and defending you all the time, so Blackpink is lucky as a whole to have Blinks, and we are lucky to have them!
